A-10 V-10

Perfect quality. Downloaded in about 6 minutes. It's broken into 2 segments because the movie is 2 hours long, but it's a small price to pay to get your hands on a prereleased movie.

And to the guy who compared it to Fallout3, it's funny that you say that because I've yet to actually watch it yet, but judging from the previews, that's the first thing that came to my head, was this was a backstory to one of the vaults or something in FO3.

A/V:9 but suspect that's just how it was made (very low budget)

M: Only skipped through it to check it out, definetly screams low budget B-movie and with people doing pretty much what you'd expect from this type of movie.

 I'd only DL it if you really have nothing else to watch at all.

A/V 7/10
